snippet.title: Frasier Fantasy: Maris Battle (Game Boy Color game link in description!)
snippet.description:
GAME LINK: https://edward-la-barbera.itch.io/frasier-fantasy

Dear listeners,

This is an example of Frasier Fantasy's turn-based battle against Maris. Safe in her sensory deprivation tank, she'll merely ring her bell for the staff to fight for her.

Frasier Fantasy is a loving tribute to the show, "Frasier," in turn-based RPG form. Filled with Easter Eggs and callbacks, this is the game for anyone wondering if Eddie ever blinked first.

Warmest Regards,
Frasier
